alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 12:07AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marshall, southwestern Jackson, southern Madison, southwestern DeKalb and southeastern Morgan Counties through 1245 AM CST... At 1207 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morgan City, or 9 miles south of Redstone Arsenal, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Huntsville, Scottsboro, Guntersville, Redstone Arsenal, Owens Cross Roads, Hollywood, Grant, Geraldine, Gurley and Section. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central and northeastern Alabama.
